transcript: And last year, I remember, like, distinctively, you were so excited to get here that you didn't realize you stepped your tone until we were in the car.

segments.text: And last year, I remember, like, distinctively, you were so excited to get here that you didn't realize you stepped your tone until we were in the car.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: And last year I remember like distinctively you were so excited to get here that you didn't realize you stubbed your toe until we were in a car.
